description: Charlton strengthen their grip on a League One play-off place as Macauley Gillesphey's winner seals a victory over Barnsley.
title: Charlton Athletic 1-0 Barnsley
maintext:
Charlton Athletic have won each of their last four home league games against Barnsley, scoring exactly twice in each.
Barnsley have only won one of their last seven league games against Charlton (D3 L3), a 3-1 victory in September 2022 under Michael Duff.
Charlton have won each of their last five home league games, their longest such run since winning seven in a row from March to August 2019.
